articles.title: Liverpool's best wonderkids according to Football Manager 2021 - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: FM21 is out now on PC, Mac, Mobile and Touch, with the FM21 Xbox Edition set to be released on December 1. But, who are the best wonderkids at Liverpool according to the game?
articles.content:
The latest release from Sports Interactive's popular Football Manager series of games, FM21, is out now on PC, Mac, Touch and Mobile.
